Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.fsys.interfaces

Interface RMIDataWrapperInterface

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIFileSystemServer
public interface RMIDataWrapperInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable

Don't use this interface for any purposes! It's a special for the RMI file system only.

Since:
0.0.1
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
